pec

Class PEC

  • java.lang.Object
    • pec.PEC
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    IPEC

    public class PEC
extends java.lang.Object
implements IPEC
    PEC class, implements the IPEC interface. It is from this class that the events are selected to run.
    Author:
    Miguel Rodrigues, nr 76176, Afonso Soares, nr 81086

      • addNewEvents

        public void addNewEvents(java.util.ArrayList<Event> new_events)
        Method to add a new list of events. Useful for when an epidemics occur, adds a new list of events without the need to check for which existing events must be deleted. Then sorts them by time.
        Specified by:
        addNewEvents in interface IPEC
        Parameters:
        new_events -
